p: Examples of the other drug for complementation and/or enhancement of the effects when the compound of the present invention is used in a regeneration therapy include cytokines and various growth factors, for example, various CSFs (for example, G-CSF, GM-CSF, etc.), various interleukins (for example, IL-3, 6, 7, 11, 12, etc.), EPO, TPO, SCF, FLT3 ligand, MIP-1α and the like.
